p: DENV-1 has been the main circulating serotype in Panama ( Figure 1 and Supplementary Figure S2). DENV-1 serotype has five genotypes (I to V) [ 15, 32]. DENV-1 genotype V has been divided into three lineages (L1, L3, L6), with L1 and L6 being the most described in the Americas [ 16, 32, 33, 34, 35]. All sequenced Panamanian DENV-1 isolates were from genotype V, and most of them had signature amino acids of L1 [ 34, 35], although they could be grouped into different clusters ( Figure 2).
